front.title: Fast Restoration of MPLS Label Switched Paths

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism for fast detection of MPLS LSPfailure when a link fails and scales to all LSPs affected by thefailure. Fast detection enables ingress LERs to quickly recoveronto backup LSPs. A performance improvement in the reliability ofLSPs is expected. The mechanism described relies on a node andnetwork architecture that integrates L1/L2/L3 technology.
